Articles.Content:
So i am not really sure where to post this but here you go.

I was playing KSP, and i FINALLY landed on moon, but my lander got flipped over. When i was in EVA mode, i enabled jetpack and attempted to fly. I did not realize i was right behind a XL extendable sollar array and i collided with it. As the second i hit the array, the rules of time and space broke and the game crashed.

Here is a download link for log file (sorry for zippyshare, i didn't knew where to post it else.)

http://www37.zippyshare.com/v/7wiGfbpH/file.html

That's not a bug... THAT'S THE KRAKEN !

How's your save doing ? Is it corrupted ?

Looks like you have upset the mighty space kraken.

In other words, it's a bug that can't be patched
